Description: Each time you <color=#0F70BC>switch characters</color>, gain 1 Energy (max <color=#0F70BC>3 stacks</color>). Spend <color=#0F70BC>3 Energy</color> to enter <color=#0F70BC>Matrix</color>, gaining <color=#0F70BC>10%</color> Extra DMG Bonus and <color=#0F70BC>1 random Signal Orb each second</color> within <color=#0F70BC>3s</color>.
UpgradeDescription: ·Gain <color=#0F70BC>10%</color> Extra DMG Bonus\n·Duration: <color=#0F70BC>3s</color>

Description: Passive Effect: Whenever <color=#0F70BC>1 character</color> dies in this mode, increase HP equal to <color=#0F70BC>5%</color> Max HP (does not apply in Classical Showdown)\nUse to decrease the enemy's Extra DMG by <color=#0F70BC>5%</color> for <color=#0F70BC>8s</color>. While in effect, if an enemy is <color=#0F70BC>defeated</color>, recover <color=#0F70BC>10%</color> of Max HP\nCD: <color=#0F70BC>25s</color>
UpgradeDescription: ·After defeating an enemy, take <color=#0F70BC>5%</color> reduced DMG for <color=#0F70BC>8s</color>\n·Meeting the requirements recovers <color=#0F70BC>10%</color> HP

Description:
Passive Effect: Upon entering combat, recover <color=#0F70BC>20% of lost HP</color>
Upon use, reduce <color=#0F70BC>20%</color> Max HP to become invincible for <color=#0F70BC>2s</color> and gain <color=#0F70BC>20%</color> Extra DMG Bonus for <color=#0F70BC>5s</color>
Cooldown: <color=#0F70BC>15s</color>
Each use will increase its HP reduction by 2x, but it <color=#0F70BC>will not be fatal</color>.
UpgradeDescription: ·Upon entering battle, recover <color=#0F70BC>20%</color> of missing HP\n·Gain <color=#0F70BC>20%</color> Extra DMG Bonus

Description: Passive Effect: After entering battle, recover HP equal to <color=#0F70BC>5% Max HP</color>\nAutomatically obtain <color=#0F70BC>2</color> Energy; <color=#0F70BC>1</color> additional Energy for each Basic Attack; and <color=#0F70BC>3</color> Energy for each 1-ping (max <color=#0F70BC>100</color> Energy)\nYou can activate once Energy reaches the limit. Once activated, <color=#0F70BC>all of your orbs</color> with be replaced with <color=#0F70BC>3 sets of Signal Orbs</color> for <color=#0F70BC>2s</color>. Orbs will be replaced based on the number of orbs used to activate skills.
UpgradeDescription: ·Upon entering the battle, recover <color=#0F70BC>5%</color> Max HP\n·Extra Signal Orbs last <color=#0F70BC>2s</color>

Description:
Restores <color=#0F70BC>6%</color> of Max HP upon casting it.
Gathers Energy and keeps pulling enemies around for <color=#0F70BC>3s</color>
When pulling the enemies, the character will be immune to damage with no attack or movement restrictions.
Skill cooldown is <color=#0F70BC>120s</color>.
UpgradeDescription: - HP equal to <color=#0F70BC>6%</color> of Max HP will be restored.\n- The effect will last <color=#0F70BC>3s</color>.

Gathers Energy and keeps pulling enemies around for <color=#0F70BC>3.5s</color>

UpgradeDescription: - HP equal to <color=#0F70BC>12%</color> of Max HP will be restored.\n- The effect will last <color=#0F70BC>3.5s</color>.

Description:

Gathers Energy and keeps pulling enemies around for <color=#0F70BC>5s</color>
When pulling the enemies, the character will be immune to damage with no attack or movement restrictions.
Skill cooldown is <color=#0F70BC>120s</color>.

Description:
The character generates a <color=#0F70BC>0.8-second</color> shield upon casing it.
Upon receiving damage from an enemy, the shield will <color=#0F70BC>resist damage once</color>
When the shield successfully resists the damage, Matrix will be triggered and the character will receive <color=#0F70BC>1</color> random Signal Orb.
Meanwhile, the character will counterattack the target and deal Physical DMG equal to <color=#0F70BC>1%</color> of current HP.
The counterattack deals <color=#0F70BC>100%</color> more DMG if the target's HP is below <color=#0F70BC>50%</color>.
Skill cooldown is <color=#0F70BC>30s</color>.
UpgradeDescription: - Gains <color=#0F70BC>1</color> random Signal Orb.\nReflects DMG equal to <color=#0F70BC>1%</color> of the target's current HP

The character generates a <color=#0F70BC>0.8-second</color> shield upon casing it.
Upon receiving damage from an enemy, the shield will <color=#0F70BC>resist damage once</color>
When the shield successfully resists the damage, Matrix will be triggered and the character will receive <color=#0F70BC>1</color> random Signal Orb.
Meanwhile, the character will counterattack the target and deal Physical DMG equal to <color=#0F70BC>2%</color> of current HP.

Description: Passive Effect: Each hit taken increases the character's all DMG by <color=#0F70BC>0.5%</color> permanently, stacking up to <color=#0F70BC>5 times</color>.\nAfter use, recovers <color=#0F70BC>3%</color> of the character's max HP per second, lasting <color=#0F70BC>3</color>s. During this period, dodging <color=#0F70BC>does not consume Dodge Gauge</color>.\nCooldown: <color=#0F70BC>90s</color>.
UpgradeDescription: · The character's DMG increases by <color=#0F70BC>0.5%</color> upon taking a hit.\n·Recovers <color=#0F70BC>3%</color> of max HP per second after use.

Description: Passive Effect: Each hit taken increases the character's all DMG by <color=#0F70BC>1%</color> permanently, stacking up to <color=#0F70BC>5 times</color>.\nAfter use, recovers <color=#0F70BC>4.5%</color> of the character's max HP per second, lasting <color=#0F70BC>3</color>s. During this period, dodging <color=#0F70BC>does not consume Dodge Gauge</color>.\nCooldown: <color=#0F70BC>90s</color>.
UpgradeDescription: · The character's DMG increases by <color=#0F70BC>1%</color> upon taking a hit.\n·Recovers <color=#0F70BC>4.5%</color> of max HP per second after use.

During this period, dodging <color=#0F70BC>does not consume Dodge Gauge</color>.\nCooldown: <color=#0F70BC>90s</color>.

During this period, dodging <color=#0F70BC>does not consume Dodge Gauge</color>.\nCooldown: <color=#0F70BC>90s</color>.

Description: Passive Effect: Each hit taken increases the character's all DMG by <color=#0F70BC>2.5%</color> permanently, stacking up to <color=#0F70BC>5 times</color>.\nAfter use, recovers <color=#0F70BC>9%</color> of the character's max HP per second, lasting <color=#0F70BC>3</color>s. During this period, dodging <color=#0F70BC>does not consume Dodge Gauge</color>.\nCooldown: <color=#0F70BC>90s</color>.
UpgradeDescription: · The character's DMG increases by <color=#0F70BC>2.5%</color> upon taking a hit.\n·Recovers <color=#0F70BC>9%</color> of max HP per second after use.

Description: Passive Effect: Upon taking fatal DMG in battle, the character does not lose HP and becomes invincible for <color=#0F70BC>1s</color>. This can only be triggered <color=#0F70BC>once</color> per battle.\nThis skill can be toggled on and off at any time. When active, each dodge consumes an additional <color=#0F70BC>250 Dodge Gauge</color>, and the character's DMG is additionally increased by <color=#0F70BC>5%</color>.
UpgradeDescription: · When the skill is active, the character deals <color=#0F70BC>5%</color> more DMG.

Description: Passive Effect: Upon taking fatal DMG in battle, the character does not lose HP and becomes invincible for <color=#0F70BC>1s</color>. This can only be triggered <color=#0F70BC>once</color> per battle.\nThis skill can be toggled on and off at any time. When active, each dodge consumes an additional <color=#0F70BC>250 Dodge Gauge</color>, and the character's DMG is additionally increased by <color=#0F70BC>10%</color>.
UpgradeDescription: · When the skill is active, the character deals <color=#0F70BC>10%</color> more DMG.

UpgradeDescription: · When the skill is active, the character deals <color=#0F70BC>15%</color> more DMG.

Description: Passive Effect: Upon taking fatal DMG in battle, the character does not lose HP and becomes invincible for <color=#0F70BC>1s</color>. This can only be triggered <color=#0F70BC>once</color> per battle.\nThis skill can be toggled on and off at any time. When active, each dodge consumes an additional <color=#0F70BC>250 Dodge Gauge</color>, and the character's DMG is additionally increased by <color=#0F70BC>25%</color>.

Description: Passive Effect: The character regains HP equal to <color=#0F70BC>0.05%</color> of the DMG dealt.\nActive Effect: After using the skill, the character becomes invincible for <color=#0F70BC>0.3s</color>, then gains Super Armor and high DMG Reduction from <color=#0F70BC>0.3 to 3s</color>. Any attacks received while invincible will trigger a shockwave dealing DMG equal to <color=#0F70BC>the character's ATK x2,260%</color> to enemies and <color=#0F70BC>reset skill cooldown</color>.\nCooldown: <color=#0F70BC>10s</color>.
UpgradeDescription: · The shockwave deals DMG equal to <color=#0F70BC>the character's ATK x2,260%</color> to enemies.

Description: Passive Effect: The character regains HP equal to <color=#0F70BC>0.05%</color> of the DMG dealt.\nActive Effect: After using the skill, the character becomes invincible for <color=#0F70BC>0.3s</color>. Any attacks received while invincible will trigger a shockwave dealing DMG equal to <color=#0F70BC>the character's ATK x2,781%</color> to enemies and <color=#0F70BC>reset skill cooldown</color>.\nCooldown: <color=#0F70BC>10s</color>.

Description: Passive Effect: The equipped character's Basic Attack DMG increases by <color=#0F70BC>40%</color>.\nActive Effect: Can be used when fully charged. Immediately grants <color=#0F70BC>2 sets of 3-Ping Orbs</color> after use and consumes all core charge; the character's <color=#0F70BC>Signature Move</color> will charge the skill.
